item.title: Press Kit
item.author: hello@vickylai.com (Vicky Lai)
item.description: Brief bio Vicky Lai is a freelance full stack developer with experience as an early-stage startup COO, UX and UI designer, entrepreneur, and team leader. She authors articles for several publications on the topics of programming, technology, startups, and remote work culture. She lives out of one bag. Headshot https://vickylai.com/img/vickylai-headshot.jpeg Social links Email: hello@vickylai.com Website: VickyLai.com Twitter: @hivickylai Mastodon: @vickylai@mastodon.technology GitHub: @vickylai
